tool_description: A curated information for all climate change news.
title: Climate_change

api_list.name: specific news
api_list.description: to search for news of a particular site
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate_change3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate_change3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about the climate change crisis and its effects.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate_change3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate_change3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
